section.name: Consulting and Support
section.p: We offer support to paying clients. We also offer customized tools around the AQ Master Server. Typical examples of short running projects are:

ul.li: ETLs to transform the AQ database structure into something more human friendly, taking care of your needs.
Writing a special importer for some proprietary data source
Setting up the master server on a proper hadoop/hbase+clustered MySQL landscape
Software engineering: C#, Java, Matlab, R? It doesn't matter for us. We can do it.
Business process reengineering: Kaizen, Kanban, SCRUM, Agile. Talk with us.
IT process reengineering: We make your data flow.

section.p: Contact us for more information: sales@activequant.com or proceed to http://www.activequant.com.
